name: dungeon-together
description: A multiplayer WebGL HTML5 dungeon game

scripts.build: npm run build:dev & npm run build:prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:dev:client & npm run build:dev:rollup & npm run build:dev:server
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:prod:client & npm run build:prod:server
scripts.build:prod:client: npm run build:dev:rollup && rollup --config build/dev/rollup/client.js && terser build/prod/client/stage/rollup.js --compress --mangle --beautify --output build/prod/client/stage/terser.js && mkdirp build/prod/client/release && ncp build/prod/client/stage/terser.js build/prod/client/release/index.js
scripts.codacy: npm run coverage && cross-cat coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage
scripts.junit: npm run build && mocha test --reporter mocha-junit-reporter

author: cpuabuse.com
